trait.name: Lucky
trait.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll

trait.name: Brave
trait.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours

trait.name: Stout Resilience
trait.desrciption: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.
